name: IteratorUtils_toStringTest
description: Unit tests for the IteratorUtils.toString method.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithDefaultDelimiter
test_cases.description: Tests the IteratorUtils.toString method with the default delimiter.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithEmptyIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the IteratorUtils.toString method with an empty iterator.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithSingleElement
test_cases.description: Tests the IteratorUtils.toString method with a single element in the iterator.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithNullElement
test_cases.description: Tests the IteratorUtils.toString method with a null element in the iterator.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithCustomDelimiter
primary_tested: IteratorUtils.toString(Iterator<String>, Transformer<Object, String>, String, String, String)
test_cases.description: Tests the IteratorUtils.toString method with a custom delimiter.
